mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_NO as roomNo , CONTENT_ID as contentId FROM TB_CHAT_ROOM WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CHAT_ROOM ( ROOM_NO , CONTENT_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROOM.NEXTVAL , #{contentId} )
INSERT INTO TB_CHAT_MESSAGE ( CHAT_MESSAGE_NO, ROOM_NO, USER_NO, MESSAGE_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAT_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL, #{roomNo}, #{userNo}, #{messageContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_MESSAGE_NO AS chatMessageNo , ROOM_NO AS roomNo , M.USER_NO AS userNo , MESSAGE_CONTENT AS messageContent , CREATED_DATE AS createdDate , U.NICKNAME AS nickname , U.REALNAME AS realname , U.USER_ID AS userId FROM TB_CHAT_MESSAGE M LEFT JOIN TB_USER U ON (M.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY CREATED_DATE ASC
